original_text: And when the king's decree which he shall make shall be published throughout all his empire, (for it is great,) all the wives shall give to their husbands honour, both to great and small.
korean_text: 왕의 조서가 이 광대한 전국에 반포되면 귀천을 막론하고 모든 여인들이 그들의 남편을 존경하리이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: shall be published throughout all his empire
all the wives shall give to their husbands honour
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 아내들은 그들의 남편에게 존경을 바칠지니
